00039 ClientKeepaliveHandler::ClientKeepaliveHandler(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &propsPtr, Session *session) : m_comm(comm), m_session(session), m_session_id(0), m_last_known_event(0) {
00040   int error;
00041   uint16_t masterPort;
00042   const char *masterHost;
00043 
00044   m_verbose = propsPtr->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00045   masterHost = propsPtr->get("Hyperspace.Master.Host", "localhost");
00046   masterPort = (uint16_t)propsPtr->get_int("Hyperspace.Master.Port", Master::DEFAULT_MASTER_PORT);
00047   m_lease_interval = (uint32_t)propsPtr->get_int("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval", Master::DEFAULT_LEASE_INTERVAL);
00048   m_keep_alive_interval = (uint32_t)propsPtr->get_int("Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval", Master::DEFAULT_KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL);
00049   
00050   if (!InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, masterHost, masterPort))
00051     exit(1);
00052 
00053   if (m_verbose) {
00054     cout << "Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval=" << m_keep_alive_interval << endl;
00055     cout << "Hyperspace.Lease.Interval=" << m_lease_interval << endl;
00056     cout << "Hyperspace.Master.Host=" << masterHost << endl;
00057     cout << "Hyperspace.Master.Port=" << masterPort << endl;
00058   }
00059 
00060   boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00061   boost::xtime_get(&m_jeopardy_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00062   m_jeopardy_time.sec += m_lease_interval;
00063 
00064   InetAddr::initialize(&m_local_addr, INADDR_ANY, 0);
00065 
00066   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp(this);
00067   if ((error = m_comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&m_local_addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00068     std::string str;
00069     HT_ERRORF("Unable to create datagram receive socket %s - %s", InetAddr::string_format(str, m_local_addr), Error::get_text(error));
00070     exit(1);
00071   }
00072 
00073   CommBufPtr commBufPtr( Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(m_session_id, m_last_known_event) );
00074 
00075   if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, commBufPtr) != Error::OK)) {
00076     HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00077     exit(1);
00078   }
00079 
00080   if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_keep_alive_interval*1000, this)) != Error::OK) {
00081     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00082     exit(1);
00083   }
00084 
00085   return;
00086 }
00087 
00091 ClientKeepaliveHandler::~ClientKeepaliveHandler() {
00092   m_comm->close_socket(m_local_addr);
00093 }

00100 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00101   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00102   int error;
00103   uint16_t command = (uint16_t)-1;
00104 
00111   if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00112     uint8_t *msgPtr = eventPtr->message;
00113     size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen;
00114 
00115     try {
00116 
00117       if (!Serialization::decode_short(&msgPtr, &remaining, &command))
00118         throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00119 
00120       // sanity check command code
00121       if (command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00122         throw ProtocolException((std::string)"Invalid command (" + command + ")");
00123 
00124       switch (command) {
00125       case Protocol::COMMAND_KEEPALIVE:
00126         {
00127           uint64_t sessionId;
00128           int state;
00129           uint32_t notificationCount;
00130           uint64_t handle, eventId;
00131           uint32_t eventMask;
00132           const char *name;
00133 
00134           if (m_session->get_state() == Session::STATE_EXPIRED)
00135             return;
00136 
00137           // update jeopardy time
00138           memcpy(&m_jeopardy_time, &m_last_keep_alive_send_time, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00139           m_jeopardy_time.sec += m_lease_interval;
00140 
00141           if (!Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &sessionId))
00142             throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00143 
00144           if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00145             throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00146 
00147           if (error != Error::OK) {
00148             if (error != Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION) {
00149               HT_ERRORF("Master session error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00150             }
00151             expire_session();
00152             return;
00153           }
00154 
00155           if (m_session_id == 0) {
00156             m_session_id = sessionId;
00157             if (!m_conn_handler_ptr) {
00158               m_conn_handler_ptr = new ClientConnectionHandler(m_comm, m_session, m_lease_interval);
00159               m_conn_handler_ptr->set_verbose_mode(m_verbose);
00160               m_conn_handler_ptr->set_session_id(m_session_id);
00161             }
00162           }
00163 
00164           if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &notificationCount)) {
00165             throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00166           }
00167 
00168           for (uint32_t i=0; i<notificationCount; i++) {
00169 
00170             if (!Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &handle) ||
00171                 !Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &eventId) ||
00172                 !Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &eventMask))
00173               throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00174 
00175             HandleMapT::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00176             //HT_INFOF("LastKnownEvent=%lld, eventId=%lld eventMask=%d", m_last_known_event, eventId, eventMask);
00177             //HT_INFOF("handle=%lldm, eventId=%lld, eventMask=%d", handle, eventId, eventMask);
00178             assert (iter != m_handle_map.end());
00179             ClientHandleStatePtr handleStatePtr = (*iter).second;
00180 
00181             if (eventMask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET || eventMask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL ||
00182                 eventMask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED || eventMask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED) {
00183               if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &name))
00184                 throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00185               if (eventId <= m_last_known_event)
00186                 continue;
00187               if (handleStatePtr->callbackPtr) {
00188                 if (eventMask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET)
00189                   handleStatePtr->callbackPtr->attr_set(name);
00190                 else if (eventMask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL)
00191                   handleStatePtr->callbackPtr->attr_del(name);
00192                 else if (eventMask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED)
00193                   handleStatePtr->callbackPtr->child_node_added(name);
00194                 else
00195                   handleStatePtr->callbackPtr->child_node_removed(name);
00196               }
00197             }
00198             else if (eventMask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_ACQUIRED) {
00199               uint32_t mode;
00200               if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &mode))
00201                 throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00202               if (eventId <= m_last_known_event)
00203                 continue;
00204               if (handleStatePtr->callbackPtr)
00205                 handleStatePtr->callbackPtr->lock_acquired(mode);
00206             }
00207             else if (eventMask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_RELEASED) {
00208               if (eventId <= m_last_known_event)
00209                 continue;
00210               if (handleStatePtr->callbackPtr)
00211                 handleStatePtr->callbackPtr->lock_released();
00212             }
00213             else if (eventMask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_GRANTED) {
00214               uint32_t mode;
00215               if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &mode) ||
00216                   !Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &handleStatePtr->lockGeneration))
00217                 throw ProtocolException("Truncated Request");
00218               if (eventId <= m_last_known_event)
00219                 continue;
00220               handleStatePtr->lockStatus = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00221               handleStatePtr->sequencer->generation = handleStatePtr->lockGeneration;
00222               handleStatePtr->sequencer->mode = mode;
00223               handleStatePtr->cond.notify_all();
00224             }
00225 
00226             m_last_known_event = eventId;
00227           }
00228           
00235           if (m_conn_handler_ptr->disconnected())
00236             m_conn_handler_ptr->initiate_connection(m_master_addr);
00237           else
00238             state = m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_SAFE);
00239 
00240           if (notificationCount > 0) {
00241             CommBufPtr commBufPtr( Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(m_session_id, m_last_known_event) );
00242             boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00243             if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, commBufPtr) != Error::OK)) {
00244               HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00245               exit(1);
00246             }
00247           }
00248 
00249           assert(m_session_id == sessionId);
00250         }
00251         break;
00252       default:
00253         throw ProtocolException((string)"Command code " + command + " not implemented");
00254       }
00255     }
00256     catch (ProtocolException &e) {
00257       std::string errMsg = e.what();
00258       HT_ERRORF("Protocol error '%s'", e.what());
00259     }
00260   }
00261   else if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::TIMER) {
00262     boost::xtime now;
00263     int state;
00264     
00265     // !!! fix - what about re-ordered packets?
00266 
00267     if ((state = m_session->get_state()) == Session::STATE_EXPIRED)
00268       return;
00269 
00270     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00271 
00272     if (state == Session::STATE_SAFE) {
00273       if (xtime_cmp(m_jeopardy_time, now) < 0) {
00274         m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00275       }
00276     }
00277     else if (m_session->expired()) {
00278       expire_session();
00279       return;
00280     }
00281 
00282     CommBufPtr commBufPtr( Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(m_session_id, m_last_known_event) );
00283 
00284     boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00285     
00286     if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, commBufPtr) != Error::OK)) {
00287       HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00288       exit(1);
00289     }
00290 
00291     if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_keep_alive_interval*1000, this)) != Error::OK) {
00292       HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00293       exit(1);
00294     }
00295   }
00296   else {
00297     HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00298   }
00299 }

00302 
00303 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::expire_session() {
00304   m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_EXPIRED);
00305   if (m_conn_handler_ptr)
00306     m_conn_handler_ptr->close();
00307   poll(0,0,2000);
00308   m_conn_handler_ptr = 0;
00309   return;
00310 }
